abstract: Jon S Corzine appears to have struck deal with Commodity Futures Trading Commission, federal agency suing former MF Global chief exec for brokerage firm's 2011 collapse and misuse of $1 billion in customer money; under settlement, Corzine will be penalized $5 million; agreement is pending approval and may be announced by year-end.

headline.print_headline: MF Global’s Fall May Cost Corzine About $5 Million
headline.main: 5 Years Later, Jon Corzine May Avoid Trial With $5 Million Settlement

snippet: The tentative deal would settle a suit by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission over the collapse of the brokerage firm MF Global....
lead_paragraph: The tentative deal would settle a suit by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission over the collapse of the brokerage firm MF Global.
